content.body: I guess we should revive https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/6695 cc Jake Archibald
content.formatted_body: I guess we should revive https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/6695 cc Jake Archibald

content.body: Hmm, why does locking an issue restrict it to people with write access. That's kinda prohibitive. Would be nice if there was a "has engaged with this organization prior to this issue" variant.
Well, the XSLT issue is locked to people with write access unfortunately. Can't be reading that all day.
Hah, yeah. I'll get that PR up to date.
Filing my yearly complaint about the HTML spec's wrapping making it hard to search
* Filing my yearly-ish complaint about the HTML spec's wrapping making it hard to search
